title: ArtyTorrent Pack 65-Digital Breaks 120-129bpm-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 65-Digital Breaks 120-129bpm-WAV samples
---------------------------------------------------------

I&#039;ve called this "Digital Breaks" because the vast majority of the loops were made with drum machines and synths, and have been processed with effects. The loops vary from typical Fatboy Slim/Chemical Brothers big beats to distorted Prodigy-style breaks. Many of the samples are severly distressed, so they will work in industrial music too. (Our friend JMP will be pleased!)
The tempo ranges from 120-129 bpm, so general house and techno fans should also find it useful.
A pack with more organic funky 2-step loops will follow later.

Torrent contains 7 RAR files with 212 loops
-------------------------------------------
Acid Fanatic Dirty 120 (10 loops)
Chicago Fire DigiBreaks 120-129 (26 loops)
Generator Drum 120 (23 loops)
Machine Language Breaks 120-129 (22 loops)
Machine Language Strange 120-129 (27 loops)
Misc Digi Breaks 120-129 (92 loops)
Punked Up 126 (12 loops)


All samples are normalized and acidized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.


Comments/thanks/requests are welcome.

--
Arty - "Take a break."
16th February 2008.
